descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Companions Lost No More
==================================================================

Author: Darkfirebird

==========
=Overview=
==========
Have you ever lost Lydia or another follower because you told them to wait and forgot them?
Have you ever wanted your follower to keep up or at least be nearby?
Well now you can!

===============
= Description =
===============
To make it simple. This adds a special quest that checks every 5 seconds on your current follower to make sure they are nearby.
What the mod does is check if they are your follower, if they are not in combat, not bleeding out or dead and moves them behind the player if
they are farther then a customizable distance.

Current Follower List: ( Note: None of them will move to you UNLESS they are your CURRENT FOLLOWER )

====================
= In-Game Settings =
====================
For customization on which NPC(s) you wish to auto adjust there are In-Game Globals you can change.

View the DFB - Companions Lost No More - Console Commands.txt for more details.
NOTE: There is also an \'emergency\' number to force ANY of them to appear to you. This is ONLY IF you need it.
Using it improperly may even bug the NPC if you never done the required quest(s) and the like to obtain them.

=========
= Notes =
=========
-Stray Dogs are not included as they are numerous and randomly generated.
-May be affected by mods that change them.
